page.title: 06NEWBOROUGH CENTRE SURVEY
page.content: We interviewed a 108 people in the Newborough Centre on Friday May 10th 1985.64 people were Kettering shoppers and the rest came from around the area. Sainsbury's is the most popular shop.88% were in favour of covered in shopping centres because it is warm and dry.64% of the people were against Sunday trading and 36% wanted the shops to open on a Sunday.52% of the people interviewed thought that the old buildings should have been knocked down.Some people thought that the old buildings should have been knocked down because they were in very bad state of repair.Some people thought they shouldnt have been knocked down because they could have been redecorated or they could have left the old building front and built behind it.
